posts.post_content:
Actually, I think these would actually "combo" better with the [Onna](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Onna) Kamigawa cycle. Combo is quoted because they are both overly exspensive.  
  
Anyway, Nikko, and Haru both can return to your hand, when you play a spirit/arcane, and they have CIP effects. At least, I think that's what Wizards was going for when they made these sets.  
  
Like it has been said before, most things from the Kamigawa block are very overcosted, and very underpowered.
posts.html:
